sentences.en: -- Quickening the development and utilization of shallow offshore waters , beaches and inland waters.
sentences.cn: -- 加快开发利用浅海 、 滩涂和内陆水面.

sentences.en: At the conclusion of the evaluation run, you should gather and evaluate the utilization levels for all four resources.
sentences.cn: 在评价运行的结论中，您应该收集并评价所有四种资源的利用率水平。

sentences.en: Company is Shanghai's largest local and comprehensive utilization of coal mining enterprises.
sentences.cn: 公司是上海本地最大的煤炭开采和综合利用企业.

sentences.en: Computer has found an increasingly wide utilization in all fields.
sentences.cn: 电子计算机已越来越广泛地在各个领域得到应用.

sentences.en: CPU utilization for last boot - up 100 %, this boot for 50 %.
sentences.cn: CPU使用率上次开机时为100%, 本次开机为50%.首页总被强行篡改.

sentences.en: Ensures maximum utilization of materials, equipment, human resources within manufacturing processes.
sentences.cn: 确保在制造过程中,实现物料, 设备, 人力的最大利用化.

sentences.en: For someone to realize the value of information, you need to organize data to permit rapid discovery and utilization.
sentences.cn: 要使某人实现信息的价值，您需要相应地组织数据以允许快速的发现和利用。

sentences.en: Improvement and utilization of waxy wheat were also discussed.
sentences.cn: 还讨论了糯小麦的改良和利用问题。

sentences.en: In addition, the city catering accommodation facility utilization rising.
sentences.cn: 另外, 我市餐饮食宿接待设施利用率不断提高.

sentences.en: Its advantage is that it leads to a better utilization of specialist resources.
sentences.cn: 它的优点是能更好地利用专家的智谋.

sentences.en: Its findings provide the scientific foundation for rational utilization of land.
sentences.cn: 它的调查结果为合理使用土地提供了科学根据.

sentences.en: Managerial self - interest motive may affect cash holdings and their utilization.
sentences.cn: 经理人‘自利动机’可能会影响到公司现金持有量以及现金使用.

sentences.en: Modern forms of agricultural utilization, have completely refuted this assumption.
sentences.cn: 现代农业利用形式, 完全驳倒了这种想象.

sentences.en: One consideration is the utilization of pages.
sentences.cn: 一个考虑因素是页的利用率。

sentences.en: Speed gear, easily limit any application of the CPU utilization.
sentences.cn: 限速齿轮, 轻松限制任何应用程序的CPU使用率.

sentences.en: That's one of the benefits of estimating: Parametric modeling gives us visibility into resource utilization, allowing us to do our jobs more quickly, more efficiently, and more accurately.
sentences.cn: 这就是评估所带来的好处之一：参量建模为我们提供了对资源利用的可见性，允许我们更加快捷、有效、精确的完成工作。

sentences.en: They represent important influences on the utilization of the feed.
sentences.cn: 它们对饲料的利用率有重大影响.

sentences.en: This insidious disease produces extensive and unmeasured economic losses through reduced efficiency in feed utilization.
sentences.cn: 这种隐伏性疾病产生了广泛的和未加统计的由于饲料利用率降低的经济损失.

sentences.en: Tungstate competitively inhibits the utilization of molybdenum for the formation of xanthine dehydrogenases.
sentences.cn: 钨酸盐竞争性地抑制钼的利用以形成黄嘌呤脱氢酶.

sentences.en: Utilization of the land which leaves it in an infertile condition is considered pollution.
sentences.cn: 把土地使用到非常贫瘠的程度被认为是一种污染.
